intro.title: 1. Introduction
intro.content: Welcome to Stay Close ("the App", "we", "us", "our"). We are committed to protecting your privacy and keeping your personal information secure. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.

userProvided.title: 2.1 Information you provide to us:
userProvided.contacts: Contacts: Names of people you want to keep in touch with

automated.title: 2.2 Information collected automatically:
automated.usage: App usage data (number of messages generated)

usage.title: 3. How We Use the Information
usage.item1: Creating personalized messages using artificial intelligence
usage.item2: Sending reminder notifications based on your settings
usage.item3: Improving the service and app experience
usage.item4: Technical support and communication with you

security.title: 4. Data Security
security.intro: We use advanced security measures to protect your information:
security.encryption: Encryption: Sensitive data (names, emails) is encrypted using AES encryption
security.secureComm: Secure Communication: All communication is conducted over HTTPS
security.backup: Secure Backup: Information is stored on secure servers

thirdParties.title: 5. Sharing Information with Third Parties
thirdParties.intro: We do not sell your personal information. We only share information with:
thirdParties.firebase: Google Firebase: For authentication and push notifications
thirdParties.ai: xAI/Groq: For generating messages (no personal identification)

rights.title: 6. Your Rights
rights.access: Access information: Request a copy of your information
rights.delete: Delete information: Request account and data deletion
rights.revoke: Revoke consent: Turn off notifications at any time

retention.title: 7. Data Retention
retention.content: We keep your information as long as your account is active. After account deletion, data will be deleted within 30 days.

children.title: 8. Children
children.content: The app is intended for users aged 13 and older. We do not knowingly collect information from children under 13.

changes.title: 9. Policy Changes
changes.content: We may update this policy from time to time. Material changes will be posted in the app and via email.

contactInfo.content: For questions regarding the Privacy Policy:
